articles.author: Huw Jones, Tom Sims
articles.title: EU stress test shows three banks falling short - Reuters
articles.description: Three banks from the European Union failed to meet binding capital requirements in a stress test that saw a theoretical 496 billion euros ($546 billion) wiped from their buffers, the bloc's banking watchdog said on Friday.
articles.content: LONDON/FRANKFURT, July 28 (Reuters) - Three banks from the European Union failed to meet binding capital requirements in a stress test that saw a theoretical 496 billion euros ($546 billion) wiped fr… [+3761 chars]

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg: Threads users down by more than a half - BBC
articles.description: The rival to Twitter saw explosive growth but users have since drifted away, Meta boss acknowledges.
articles.content:
Meta boss Mark Zuckerberg says its new social media platform, Threads, has lost more than half its users.
The Twitter rival rocketed to more than 100 million users within five days of its launch ear… [+2090 chars]
